law.catch_line: In this title the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this title the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Division" means the Division of Development Finance.

"Elderly household" means one or more individuals who occupy a residential dwelling unit, at least one of whom meets the age limit specified by the Secretary that:
is greater than or equal to age 55; and
may vary for different programs or types of projects.
"Elderly rental housing project" means a project that meets the qualifications in § 4-407 of this title.

"Nonprofit sponsor" means a sponsor that is:
a nonprofit organization; or
a limited partnership, if:
each general partner is a nonprofit organization; or
each general partner is a wholly owned subsidiary of a nonprofit organization;
the limited partnership is formed to undertake a project that is eligible as a whole or in part for a federal program or incentive, including low-income housing tax credits; and
a nonprofit organization manages the project or will receive the net cash flow or residual sale proceeds on the sale of the project.
